channel.title: Pretti on Daytona 500 | The Great American Race
channel.description: Recent content in Pretti on Daytona 500 | The Great American Race

item.title: Watch: BBC at protests near scene where Alex Pretti was shot dead
item.description: Protesters chanted Alex Pretti’s name after he became the second person this month to be shot dead by federal agents in Minneapolis.

item.title: What we know about fatal shooting of Alex Pretti by federal agents in Minneapolis
item.description: Trump officials says federal agents shot in self-defence, as Pretti’s parents accuse them of “sickening lies”.

item.title: Who was Alex Pretti, the intensive care nurse shot dead in Minneapolis?
item.description: He has been described as an avid outdoorsman who loved mountain biking.

item.title: Outrage after US agents kill ICU nurse Alex Pretti in Minnesota
item.description: Authorities say Alex Pretti posed a violent threat when shot by US ICE agents, but multiple videos suggest otherwise.

item.title: The far-left network that helped put Alex Pretti in harm's way, then made him a martyr
item.description: Encrypted chats show activists tracked ICE agents using a sophisticated database before the fatal shooting of Alex Pretti in Minneapolis. They then used it to mobilize agitators.
